name: Maria, Maxwell's human
text: Maxwell rarely trusts people, but Jack found a way to his heart. He really is a dog whisperer.

name: Mom
text: Just write something yourself and I'll sign it.

name: Ali and Sophie, Otis' parents
text: Jack is reliable, genuinely loves dogs, and has been a total game-changer for our routine. If youâ€™re looking for someone who treats your dog like their own, Jack is your man. Highly recommend!
